law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to establish security requirements for prescriptions -- Waiver.
law.text: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A that establish security requirements for all prescriptions written by practitioners. The administrative regulations shall include a procedure to obtain a waiver for prescription blanks that provide substantially equivalent protection against forgery.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 544, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1998.
